question: Two years ago I lost my leg to diabetes, it is below the knee amputation the last couple of months I have had a burning sensation at the scar site. I noticed that the scar has opened about 1" out of a scar that goes around my leg there is no blood just a small amount of fluid it won't scab over. I was at a dermatologist for another issue he gave me some Fluocinonide cream and there was no change any help would be nice or who should I go see to get help.    Thank You
title: scar opening
